approach:
For employees to contribute optimally, organizations need to engage the whole person’s;

Hand, Head, and Heart
approach_ar:
لكي يساهم الموظفون بشكل مثالي، تحتاج المنظمات إلى إشراك الشخص بأكمله؛

اليد والعقل والقلب

approach: We believe that HR value is defined by the receivers(managers) and not by the giver (HR department) and thus we assess the managers' experience in handling HR activities in a way serving their business needs.
approach_ar: نؤمن بأن من يحدد القيمة الحقيقية لقسم الموارد البشرية هم المديرين ، ولهذا يعتمد المنهج على تقييم تجربة المديرين لأنشطة الموارد البشرية بما يخدم الأهداف الإستراتيجية

approach: It is an easy-to-administer questionnaire for reviewing leaders at any level of management. It captures confidential feedback from the individual manager, his/her own manager, peers, and direct reports. The report provides a measure of the individual’s attitude, behavior, and performance.
approach_ar: إنه استبيان سهل الإدارة لمراجعة القادة على أي مستوى من مستويات الإدارة. يلتقط التعليقات السرية من المدير الفردي ومديره / مديرها وأقرانه والتقييم الشخصي. يقدم التقرير مقياسا لموقف الفرد وسلوكه وأدائه.

approach: Engaging the heart is the center of employee engagement.  When the heart is engaged, the mind will be stimulated to think.  When the heart and mind are active, the human-being is ready to contribute (give hand) if enabled.
approach_ar: Engaging the heart is the center of employee engagement.  When the heart is engaged, the mind will be stimulated to think.  When the heart and mind are active, the human-being is ready to contribute (give hand) if enabled.

approach:
Employee Engagement:

The emotional, mental, and physical connection of employees to the organization that stimulates an extraordinary contribution that achieves a win-win situation; better employee experience and better organizational outcome.
approach_ar:
Employee Engagement:

The emotional, mental, and physical connection of employees to the organization that stimulates an extraordinary contribution that achieves a win-win situation; better employee experience and better organizational outcome.

approach: We also believe in the value of enhancing the employee experience and thus we also capture employees’ voices.
approach_ar: We also believe in the value of enhancing the employee experience and thus we also capture employees’ voices.

approach: We don't believe in a one-size-fits-all approach and in "Best Practices" and thus we assess the outcome/results and identify the possible root causes which need to be validated &refined.
approach_ar: We don't believe in a one-size-fits-all approach and in "Best Practices" and thus we assess the outcome/results and identify the possible root causes which need to be validated &refined.

approach: 4Ps stands for People, Performance, Plasticity and Presence
approach_ar: 4Ps stands for People, Performance, Plasticity and Presence
